name: meme-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for LAN webapps served by an Electron host

scripts.dev:
echo '
*** USING WEBPACK HOT DEV SERVER' && webpack-dev-server  --mode development --inline --hot --host 0.0.0.0 --config=./src/config/webpack.webapp.config.js --env.HMR_MODE='wds'
scripts.electron:
echo '
*** USING ELECTRON-BASED HOT DEV SERVER' && webpack --mode development --config ./src/config/webpack.console.config.js --env.HMR_MODE='electron' && npx electron ./built/console/ur-main
scripts.package:
echo '
*** BUILDING STANDALONE APP in dist/meme-darwin-x64' && rm -fr ./dist ./built && webpack --mode production --config ./src/config/webpack.dist.config.js --env.HMR_MODE='none' && cd built && npm install && npx electron-packager . meme --out ../dist --overwrite --app-bundle-id com.davidseah.inquirium.meme
scripts.appsign:
echo '
*** SIGNING APP BUNDLE' && npx electron-osx-sign ./dist/meme-darwin-x64/meme.app --platform=darwin --type=distribution
scripts.apptest:
echo '
*** VERIFYING CODE SIGNATURE' && codesign -dvv ./dist/meme-darwin-x64/meme.app && echo '
*** RUNNING APP W/CONSOLE OUTPUT...' && ./dist/meme-darwin-x64/meme.app/Contents/MacOS/meme

author: Inquirium LLC; Dave Seah
